name: 1688验证3个商家
description: 提取3个商家信息并逐一验证

nodes.name: 等待搜索结果完全加载

config.script: console.log('🔍 开始提取商家信息...'); const merchants = []; const offerItems = document.querySelectorAll('.sm-offer-item, .offer-item, .sm-offer, [class*=offer]'); console.log(`找到 ${offerItems.length} 个商家`); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(3, offerItems.length); i++) { const item = offerItems[i]; const title = item.querySelector('h4, [class*=title], a[title]'); const link = item.querySelector('a[href*="1688.com"]'); const price = item.querySelector('[class*=price], [data-price]'); const wangwang = item.querySelector('span.J_WangWang'); const merchantLink = link ? link.href : null; let merchantId = null; if (merchantLink) { const idMatch = merchantLink.match(/member_id=([\d]+)/); if (idMatch) merchantId = idMatch[1]; } const chatUrl = wangwang ? wangwang.querySelector('a.ww-link') : null; merchants.push({ index: i + 1, merchantId: merchantId, title: title ? title.textContent.trim() : '', merchantLink: merchantLink, price: price ? price.textContent.trim() : '', chatUrl: chatUrl ? chatUrl.href : null }); console.log(`商家 ${i + 1}: ${title ? title.textContent.trim().substring(0, 30) : '无标题'}, ID: ${merchantId}`); } return { success: true, merchants: merchants, totalFound: offerItems.length, extractedCount: merchants.length };
